question: Which tiger reserve has bagged the first-ever international awardâ€™ TX2, for doubling the number of tigers in four years against a target of 10 years?
explanation: The Pilibhit Tiger Reserve and the Uttar Pradesh Forest Department bagged the first ever international award TX2. This tiger reserve was awarded for doubling its number of tigers in four years. The target set was to double the numbers in ten years. The target was set by the partners of the award in 2010.
